title: Virtus Global Dividend & Income Fund Inc. (ZTR) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Virtus Global Dividend & Income Fund Inc. ( ZTR  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.113 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 20, 2019. Shareholders who purchased ZTR prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 36th quarter that ZTR has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $11.06, the dividend yield is 12.26%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ZTR was $11.06, representing a -7.13% decrease from the 52 week high of $11.91 and a 33.41% increase over the 52 week low of $8.29.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ZTR Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
